# A Revolutionary Family

| runtime        =
| country        = China
| language       = Mandarin
| budget         =
}}
A Revolutionary Family (, translit. Geming jiating) is a 1961 Chinese drama film directed by Shui Hua. It was entered into the 2nd Moscow International Film Festival.
Cast
* Shi Xiaoman
* Sun Daolin
* Yu Lan as Zhou Lian
* Zhang Lian
